items.name: PirateFlag
items.speechOutput: draw the flag of your own pirate ship
items.speechTip: Get a big piece of paper so that you can turn this into a real flag later. Also, remember to make it scary enough to protect your boat
items.cardTitle: Draw the flag for your pirates ship
items.cardContent: Get a big piece of paper so that you can turn this into a real flag later. Extra points if you use a parrot.
items.additionalText: Make it scary - make the eyes scary

items.name: Ant
items.speechOutput: draw an ant with six big feet who has lost his friends
items.speechTip: Some of his feet should have shoes, add some detail to his hairy legs.  Remember to give him a really cool name.
items.cardContent: Some of his feet should have shoes, add some detail to his hairy legs.  Remember to give him a really cool name.
items.additionalText: Make sure it has six legs and an antennae

items.name: Bridge
items.speechOutput: draw a bridge with you on one side and an amazing place on the other.
items.speechTip: Add some detail to the floor of the bridge.  Is there anything living near your bridge?
items.cardTitle: A bridge to an amazing place
items.cardContent: Add some detail to the floor of the bridge. Extra points if you someone can guess your amazing place.

items.name: HalfFace
items.speechOutput: draw the left side of your face
items.speechTip: Get a mirror and keep to the left hand side only.  When you are finished get someone else to draw the right hand side.
items.cardContent: When you are finished get someone else to draw the right hand side.

items.name: FrogTelephone
items.speechOutput: draw a frog that is being used as a telephone
items.speechTip: Think if the frog is enjoying this or not - let his feelings show through in your drawing.
items.cardContent: Extra points if the frog has numbers on him to be used as a real telephone.

items.name: UpsideDownMan
items.speechOutput: draw a man who is in a smart suit and standing on his head.
items.speechTip: It is classed as cheating if you turn the paper upside down.  Think if his suit still fits if he is upside down.
items.cardContent: It is classed as cheating if you turn the paper upside down.
